articles.title: Researchers Observe Daydreaming in Mice Brains - Technology Networks
articles.description: By observing daydreaming mice, researchers are one step closer to figuring out what happens in the brain when we daydream, identifying an overlooked brain region that may be involved.
articles.content:
You are sitting quietly, and suddenly your brain tunes out the world and wanders to something else entirely perhaps a recent experience, or an old memory. You just had a daydream.
